description: Miro is a collaborative online whiteboard enabling teams to brainstorm ideas, design wireframes, plan workflows, and manage projects visually

capabilities.name: MIRO_CREATE_APP_CARD_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to add an app card item to a board. Use when you need to push a rich preview card with custom fields into a Miro board (e.g., after assembling card data).

capabilities.name: MIRO_CREATE_BOARD
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new board. Use when you need to set up a board with a specific name, description, and policies. Example: "Create a new board named Project Plan".

capabilities.name: MIRO_DELETE_APP_CARD_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to delete an app card item from a board. Use when you need to remove an app card item created by your app after it is no longer needed.

capabilities.name: MIRO_DELETE_DOCUMENT_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a document item from a board. Use when you need to remove a document item (e.g., PDF or image) that is no longer relevant. Example: "Delete the document item with ID 'item456' from board 'board123'."

capabilities.name: MIRO_DELETE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific item from a board. Use when you need to remove an item (e.g., shape, sticky note) after confirming its board and item IDs.

capabilities.name: MIRO_GET_APP_CARD_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a specific app card item by its ID. Use when you need the details of an existing app card item.

capabilities.name: MIRO_GET_BOARD
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific board. Use when you have a board ID and need to fetch its metadata.

capabilities.name: MIRO_GET_BOARD_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Tool to list items on a Miro board (shapes, stickies, cards, etc.) with pagination. Use when you need to page through board elements for analytics or reporting.

capabilities.name: MIRO_GET_BOARD_MEMBERS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of members for a board. Use when you need to list all users with access to a board after confirming its ID.

capabilities.name: MIRO_GET_BOARDS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve accessible boards with optional filters. Use when you need to list or search boards by team, project, owner, or keywords.

capabilities.name: MIRO_GET_CONNECTORS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of connectors on a board. Use after confirming the board ID and when you need to page through connector items.

capabilities.name: MIRO_GET_TAG
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific tag on a board. Use when you have a board ID and tag ID and need its metadata.

capabilities.name: MIRO_LIST_ORGANIZATIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve list of organizations accessible to the user. Use when you need to view all available organizations.

capabilities.name: MIRO_UPDATE_APP_CARD_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to update an app card item on a board. Use when you need to modify properties of an existing app card item. Include only fields to change.

capabilities.name: MIRO_UPDATE_BOARD
capabilities.description: Tool to update properties of a specific board. Use when you have a board ID and need to modify its name, description, or permissions policy. Use after confirming the board exists.
